description:
Solve puzzles as they come at you non-stop and survive to the end!

This Picross focuses on 5x5 high-speed puzzles!
Enjoy a thrilling, stylish new kind of Picross!
Local and online multiplayer are also supported!
Defeat UZBOROSS with friends or strangers!

Change the game screen, or characters' outfits however you like!
If you have play data from the Picross S series or Working Zombies, 
you can get special skins by linking your data!

Picross is a picture crossword puzzle game where you follow hint number to complete a picture.
With simple, easy-to-follow rules, it's a game anyone can play!
name: PICROSS X : PICBITS VS UZBOROSS
